attributes.action: do everything in his power to ensure stability in the Balkans, and specifically to ensure that the EU peacekeeping force's mandate in Bosnia is renewed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
• Bosnia is now in its worst political crisis since the Bosnian war ended.  There are deep constitutional disagreements and steeply rising food prices.  

• Kosovo is likely to become independent in December. Some regional politicians have linked the fates of Kosovo and the Bosnian Serb entity, suggested that the Bosnian Serb entity should hold a referendum on independence if Kosovo becomes independent. 

• Disputes over the Serbs’ place in Bosnia were a cause of the last Bosnian war. 

• The mandate of international peacekeeping forces in Bosnia ends on November 21.
